amendment.description: An amendment numbered 104 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding for the Small Business Administration to create any new business lending program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Williams (TX) amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Williams (TX) amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.
